text: "Another One Rides the Bus" is a song by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a parody of "Another One Bites the Dust" by Queen. It was released in 1981 on Yankovic's first EP. It was also released on Yankovic's self-titled first album in 1982. Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:Parodies Category:1981 songs
title: Another One Rides the Bus
